name: Armadillo (OGSuperSand)
description:
Play as an armadillo who wants to journey as far away from home as possible. Roll to the ends of Earth until you're dead... well actually, death won't even stop this armadillo. Roll even through heaven and hell.

How to Play:

Bounce on enemies and travel a long distance to gain SCORE. Killing some enemies will yield KARMA which will be used to determine if the armadillo will go to heaven or hell upon death... not that that will stop the adventurous armadillo.

Credits:

Design & Development - OGSuperSand

Music & SFX - Chord Cutter
